Articles.Content:
hay all.

thought id come say hello and ask for some help finding some stuff,

im not new to space but i was limited... BUT NOT NO MORE!!! hehe

i just got the full game as i love it so much, (specially Jeb but hay its Jeb...)

now i have the full thing i was looking for some nice addons for it, (like satellites and solar panels and space junk)

altho its hard to find so it seems, can anyone tell me some goodones that are fun please.

see you all in the black.
Hmm, no need for two of these, they are almost the same, I better close this one
